text:
[Verse]
Raindrops on my face
Feet move in a race
Smile lights up my space
Lost in this embrace

[Verse 2]
Clouds above look gray
Don't care what they say
Lost in rhythm sway
Dreaming far away

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Wash away the pain
Feel it in my veins
Moving with no chains

[Verse]
Puddles splash around
Heart beat is the sound
Lifted off the ground
In this joy I'm found

[Verse 2]
Every drop a beat
Dancing on the street
Barefoot in the heat
Love's in every feet

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Wash away the pain
Feel it in my veins
Moving with no chains
title: Dancing in the Rain
